Articles.Content:
When I take control of a base, more times than not, when it transitions to the base, the base is several meters in the air and falling. Now I have a Minmus mining base with a tanker parked next to it. Every time I get close with a ship or transition to it, the tanker flies 100m or more in the air. Sometimes it survives, this time it landed on my base.

It's done it forever, with anything from Mechjeb only to Mechjeb with several other mods.
